54bc35cc-0d5c-43af-8bab-50d623672652.description: Earners of the The Hotel School: Hotel Career Ready badge have located and effectively used career relevant information about the hotel industry to plan their careers. They have reviewed hotel companies and respective brand identities, potential job roles, and career pathways, including the knowledge, skills and behavioural competencies required. Using self-appraisal they have identified their strengths and areas for growth and set well-defined goals to enhance employability.
54bc35cc-0d5c-43af-8bab-50d623672652.name: The Hotel School: Career Ready

issuer.summary: issued by The Hotel School Australia

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in the Workshop: "Hotel Career Pathways & Capabilities" delivered by The Hotel School's Professional Learning Centre
Participate in a one-to-one Career Coaching session with The Hotel School's Work Integrated Learning & Careers Team
Complete a GALLUP Top 5 CliftonStrengths Assessment
Create a Career Plan based on the GROW Coaching Model
Create and optimise a Resume that is Industry Ready
